text: @WhiteHouse @HouseGOP We should all remember that Trump administration & GOP decided to ignore the devastating effects of the Coronavirus w/late action. We should all post deaths on Twitter accounts of WHITEHOUSE, TRUMP’s, POTUS & Fox News. Let’s keep track of all American that died needlessly!
